pkgmetadata.longdescription: Visualization of Genetic Association Studies // Visualizes the relationship between allele frequency and effect size in genetic association studies. The input is a data frame containing association results. The output is a plot with the effect size of risk variants in the Y axis, and the allele frequency spectrum in the X axis. Corte et al (2023) doi:10.1101/2023.04.21.23288923.
